description:
http://anidb.net/ch9101 [Moroboshi Ataru] is possibly the most unfaithful, unlucky and lecherous idiot to have ever been born, but for some reason http://anidb.net/ch9099 [Lum], a tigerskin-bikini clad alien package of sex appeal, jealousy and electricity has fallen for him.
The misadventures of these two stubborn teenagers are spiced up by a veritable entourage of eccentric characters. Among these characters is http://anidb.net/ch9104 [Shuutarou] the richest boy on the planet, http://anidb.net/ch9108 [Shinobu] a superhuman schoolgirl, http://anidb.net/ch9115 [Ten] a fire-breathing baby, http://anidb.net/ch9134 [Sakura] a powerful and very beautiful priestess/school nurse, http://anidb.net/ch9125 [Ran] a cute and psychotic alien vixen with a split personality, a gender-bending martial artist, http://anidb.net/ch9129 [Benten] an alien biker chick, http://anidb.net/ch9120 [Oyuki] the ice queen of Neptune, http://anidb.net/ch9117 [Cherry] a deranged monk, a giant ghost cat and many other lunatic personalities; aliens, humans and non-humans alike interact in endless hysteria in a town named Tomobiki.
